body:
OCN RIPOFF!
OCN COPY!

Please refrain from making those replies since it doesn't have to be the same name and the same theme.


The idea is simple. Make a Ask the seniors part inside the forums.


You can make posts and only Seniors may answer.

This obviously is gonna need some rules, like don't making silly posts.


You could ask the seniors anything you'd like, with, As I said, with Some rules.

Opinions?

replies.body:
OCN RIPO-

I mean...

Yeah, I'd like this. Since some of the Seniors are almost impossible to contact on Skype. Then there's the problem where conversations literally only last two minutes for one reason or another. Anyway, I think it this was implemented it would be a much easier and efficient way to contact staff.

+1
